quote: Any man who has had the job I've had and didn't have a sense of humor wouldn't still be here.
A person without a sense of humor is like a wagon without springs-jolted by every pebble in the road.
A well-developed sense of humor is the pole that adds balance to your steps as you walk the tightrope of life.
Advertisers also know that humor can help bond us to their product.
Any attempts at humor immediately after September 11th were deemed tasteless.
Anyone without a sense of humor is at the mercy of everyone else.
As a person is so must you humor them.
Celebrate your successes. Find some humor in your failures.
Cynicism is humor in ill health.
Cynicism is the humor of hatred.
Defining and analyzing humor is a pastime of humorless people.
Any man who has had the job I've had and didn't have a sense of humor wouldn't still be here.
A person without a sense of humor is like a wagon without springs-jolted by every pebble in the road.
A well-developed sense of humor is the pole that adds balance to your steps as you walk the tightrope of life.
Advertisers also know that humor can help bond us to their product.
Any attempts at humor immediately after September 11th were deemed tasteless.
Anyone without a sense of humor is at the mercy of everyone else.
As a person is so must you humor them.
Celebrate your successes. Find some humor in your failures.
Cynicism is humor in ill health.
Cynicism is the humor of hatred.
Defining and analyzing humor is a pastime of humorless people.
Fortune and humor govern the world.
Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
Good humor isn't a trait of character, it is an art which requires practice.
Good taste and humor are a contradiction in terms, like a chaste whore.
Humor brings insight and tolerance. Irony brings a deeper and less friendly understanding.
Humor can alter any situation and help us cope at the very instant we are laughing.
Humor can be one of our best survival tools.
Humor distorts nothing, and only false gods are laughed off their earthly pedestals.
Humor does not diminish the pain - it makes the space around it get bigger.
Humor expands our limited picture frame and gets us to see more than just our problem.
Humor heals the heckler.
Humor is a universal language.
Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law.
Humor is by far the most significant activity of the human brain.
Humor is consistent with pathos, whilst wit is not.
Humor is emotional chaos remembered in tranquility.
Humor is just another defense against the universe.
Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.
Humor is the affectionate communication of insight.
Humor is the first gift to perish in a foreign language.
Humor is the greatest blessing of mankind.
Humor must not professedly teach and it must not professedly preach, but it must do both if it would live forever.
I could not tread these perilous paths in safety, if I did not keep a saving sense of humor.
I have a fine sense of the ridiculous, but no sense of humor.
I have a fine sense of the ridiculous, but no sense of humor.
If I had no sense of humor, I would long ago have committed suicide.
Imagination was given man to compensate for what he is not, and a sense of humor to console him for what he is.
In conversation, humor is worth more than wit and easiness more than knowledge.
In my opinion, I think sarcasm and humor in a song, without turning it into a novelty song, is really charming.
In the theatre, as in life, we prefer a villain with a sense of humor to a hero without one.
It is the saying of an ancient sage that humor was the only test of gravity, and gravity of humor.
It is well known that Beauty does not look with a good grace on the timid advances of Humor.
Keeping an active mind has been vital to my survival, as has been maintaining a sense of humor.
Laughter, and the broader category of humor, are key elements in helping us go on with our life after a loss.
Men are happy to be laughed at for their humor, but not for their folly.
Men live by intervals of reason under the sovereignty of humor and passion.
Men will confess to treason, murder, arson, false teeth, or a wig. How many of them will own up to a lack of humor?
Never say a humorous thing to a man who does not possess humor. He will always use it in evidence against you.
Nothing makes your sense of humor disappear faster than having someone ask where it is.
Nothing spoils a romance so much as a sense of humor in the woman.
People of humor are always in some degree people of genius.
Probably it is impossible for humor to be ever a revolutionary weapon. Candide can do little more than generate irony.
Sometimes it takes ten seconds to see some humor in your dilemmas, sometimes ten years.
That is the saving grace of humor, if you fail no one is laughing at you.
The comic is the perception of the opposite; humor is the feeling of it.
The first glass is for myself, the second for my friends, the third for good humor, and the forth for my enemies.
The first ingredient in conversation is truth, the next good sense, the third good humor, and the fourth wit.
The hall-mark of American humor is its pose of illiteracy.
The love of truth lies at the root of much humor.
The most perfect humor and irony is generally quite unconscious.
The secret source of humor itself is not joy but sorrow. There is no humor in heaven.
The secret to humor is surprise.
The sense of humor has other things to do than to make itself conspicuous in the act of laughter.
The total absence of humor from the Bible is one of the most singular things in all literature.
There is nothing in the world so irresistibly contagious as laughter and good humor.
Throughout history, great leaders have known the power of humor.
When people are in the midst of really heavy stuff and still have a sense of humor, I admire that.
Where ever you find humor, you find pathos close by it side.
Whether planned or not, humor takes our mind off of our troubles.
Wit is the lowest form of humor.
You are not angry with people when you laugh at them. Humor teaches tolerance.
You may not be able to change a situation, but with humor you can change your attitude about it.
